comment._content: Handsome Harold Roy "Hal" Ballin, tackle on the 1913 Princeton football team, photographed in the Princeton stadium on November 12, 1913. He lived to be 86: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harold_Ballin

Thanks for the information on Mr. Ballin. We will add to the record when we update.

comment._content: What a great name for a football player: Ballin'
